alert.note: Alert for Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 8:07PM CDT until July 29 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WALWORTH...NORTHWESTERN RACINE AND SOUTHEASTERN WAUKESHA COUNTIES... At 807 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waterford North, or near Mukwonago, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Muskego, Mukwonago, Wind Lake, Vernon, Rochester, Big Bend, Waterford North, Potter Lake, and Waterford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
